name: Finish The Line
description: TWO PLAYERS PLAY ALTERNATELY. PLAYERS TRY TO PLACE THEIR MARKS SO EFFICIENTLY THAT THEY CAN FINISH ROW, COLUMN OR DIAGONAL FORMATION. NOT ONLY CENTRAL BUT ALSO SHORTER DIAGONALS MADE OF THREE, FOUR, FIVE MARKS, ETC. ONCE A PLAYER SUCCEEDS THAT PLAYER GETS THE NUMBER OF POINTS CORRESPONDING TO THE NUMBER OF SQUARES. THE GAME ENDS WHEN ALL SQUARES ARE FILLED. PLAYER WITH MORE POINTS WINS.
